RT @RepGilCisneros: Proud to work with @RepRubenGallego to introduce a bill that would expand Medicaid to cover #coronavirus treatment. Wit…

Our bill would make sure no American fighting #coronavirus is stuck w massive hospital & ICU bills. With millions of Americans losing jobs & potentially insurance, we must strengthen our safety net so we can focus on combatting the virus & saving lives, not paying medical bills.

Congress has passed legislation to ensure Americans can receive testing for free. But there’s no national plan to make sure people with #coronavirus can receive the treatment they need without worrying about cost.

Nobody should ever have to worry about medical bills, but certainly not during a pandemic. Today I introduced a bill with @RepGilCisneros to allow anyone with #COVID19 to be automatically eligible for Medicaid to cover related treatment.

Galls did the right thing.
